comment: Giving plenty of advance warning - candidates who don't believe my daughter and I can be trusted with decisions concerning our own bodies can stay away from our door . We don't have a dog but I have sharp teeth - and an even sharper tongue .
amr:
# ::snt Giving plenty of advance warning - candidates who don't believe my daughter and I can be trusted with decisions concerning our own bodies can stay away from our door . We don't have a dog but I have sharp teeth - and an even sharper tongue .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (w / warn-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (p / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (s / stay-01
                        :ARG1 (c / candidate
                              :ARG0-of (b / believe-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                                          :ARG1 (t / trust-01
                                                :ARG1 (d / decide-01
                                                      :ARG3 (b2 / body
                                                            :poss (a / and
                                                                  :op1 ii
                                                                  :op2 (p3 / person
                                                                        :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                                                                              :ARG1 ii
                                                                              :ARG2 (d2 / daughter))))))
                                                :ARG2 a))))
                        :ARG3 (a2 / away
                              :op1 (d3 / door
                                    :poss (w2 / we))))
                  :quant (p4 / plenty))
            :ARG1-of (ii2 / in-advance-04))
      :snt2 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (h2 / have-03
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG0 (w3 / we)
                  :ARG1 (d4 / dog))
            :ARG2 (h3 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                  :ARG1 (a3 / and
                        :op1 (t2 / tooth
                              :ARG1-of (s2 / sharp-02))
                        :op2 (t3 / tongue
                              :ARG1-of (s3 / sharp-02
                                    :mod (e / even)))))))

comment: Let them call - ask for about leaflets to share , and then burn all the leaflets . It will cost them to print more , and keeps them out of others homes .
amr:

(m / multi-sentence

                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y / you)
                  :ARG1 (c / call-02

            :op2 (a2 / ask-02

                                    :ARG0 t))))
            :op3 (b / burn-01
                  :mode imperative
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you

                              :mod (a4 / all))
                        :time (t2 / then)))
            :snt2 (a5 / and

                        :ARG1 (p / print-01
                              :ARG0 (t3 / they)
                              :ARG1 (l4 / leaflet
                                    :mod (m2 / more)))

                  :op2 (k / keep-04

                              :ARG1 t3
                              :ARG2 (h / home

comment: Nasty and wasteful . Please be kind to all .
amr:

comment: There s nothing kind at all about forced birth proponents , or racists . I m more than happy to waste their resources . It may save someone else from their toxic views .
amr:

      :snt1 (n / nothing
            :mod (a / at-all)
            :topic (o / or
                  :op1 (p / proponent
                        :mod (b / bear-02
                              :ARG2-of (f / force-01)))
                  :op2 (r / racist)))
      :snt2 (h / happy-01
            :ARG0 (w / waste-01
                  :ARG1 (r2 / resource
                        :poss (t / they)))
            :ARG1 (ii / i)
            :degree (m2 / more-than))
      :snt3 (p2 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (s / save-02
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / it)
                  :ARG1 (s2 / someone
                        :mod (e / else))
                  :ARG2 (v / view-02
                        :ARG0 t
                        :mod (t2 / toxic)))))
